page.title: 03ST.MARYS CHURCH, HARTPURY
page.content: The non-stipendary Anglican Vicar of St.Mary's Church since 1978 is Rev.J. Evans who is also Headteacher of Corse School. Each month they hold the following services:-1st Sun.-Matins; 2nd Sun.-Family Communion; 3rd Sun.- Evensong (alternate months a Youth Service);4th Sun.-Parish Communion. The average collection is Â£15. There are 36 people on the Electoral Roll of which 25 members form the Parochial Church Council to adminster church affairs. In the last five years the Council has repaired the tower and rehung the bells at a cost of Â£25,000 raised by grants and social functions. Presently, they are in the process of making a decision to repair the organ at a cost of Â£5,000.
